import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import cn from 'classnames' import useComponentVisible from '../../../hooks/useComponentVisible' import useWindowSize from '../../../hooks/useWindowSize' import CONST from '../../../constants' import Button from '../../button' import styles from './header.module.css' const Header = ({ className, ...props }) => { const { setIsComponentVisible } = useComponentVisible(false) const size = useWindowSize() useEffect(() => { if (size.width > CONST.MOBILE_SIZE) { setIsComponentVisible(false) } }) return (
) } export default Header
